text.text:
*Are you trying to submit to a Task? Please follow the below directions: *
    *1.* Complete the task's objective 
    *2.* Go to the @TaskBot DM channel here on Slack 
    *3.* Type the task number & attach that task's image (see below)

.  *4.* Send the message!
    *5.* We'll check the task & send back a confirmation of completion 
            â€¢  This step may take a few minutes
